author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Displays the contents of the specified remote file located in the War Room.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-get-external-file

commands.description: Searches for a string in a remote file.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-search-external-file

commands.description: Updates the instance context with the specified list name and list items, and then overrides the path of the remote file with the internal list.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-update

commands.description: Updates internal list data with the contents of a remote file.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-update-from-external-file

commands.description: Deletes a file from a remote server.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-delete-external-file

commands.description: Displays internal list data in the War Room.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-print-internal-list

commands.description: Dumps (copies) instance context to either the incident context or a file.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-dump-internal-list

commands.description: Search for a string in internal list.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-search-internal-list

commands.description: Compares internal list and external file contents.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-compare

commands.description: Gets metadata for an external file.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-get-external-file-metadata

commands.description: Updates the instance context with the specified list name and list items.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-update-internal-list

commands.description: Updates a remote file with the contents of an internal list.
commands.name: pan-os-edl-update-external-file
